name: Unknown Transmission
description:
Pick up where they left off...

Finding abandoned computer equipment, you've booted it up and have logged in to the servers... 

Inside you gain access to the simulation, a complex retelling of events, and decide to dig deeper.

Explore the procedurally generated nightmares of WWI, as a British soldier left behind after a mysterious evacuation. Find weapons, ammo, and whatever else was left behind. And beware, untold horror lurk in the fog...

Controls:
[WASD] - Move
[Mouse] - Look
[E] - Interact
[LMB] - Use Item
[Scroll] - Swap Item
[RMB] - Examine
[R] - Reload
[Tab] - Inventory
[F] - lantern

Post-Jam Content update planned
